---
title: "Table of Contents"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
css: 'css/font.css'
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  cache = TRUE
)
```

```{r results='asis'}
js_file <- list.files(path = "./js-exercise", pattern = "*.html", recursive = TRUE)
note_file <- list.files(path = "./note", pattern = "*.html", recursive = TRUE)

sprintf("<a href='js-exercise/%s'>%s</a>", js_file, stringr::str_remove(string = js_file, ".html")) |> cat(sep = "\n\n")
sprintf("<a href='note/%s'>%s</a>", note_file, stringr::str_remove(string = note_file, ".html")) |> cat(sep = "\n\n")
```
